MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Mapping loads TTS Standard Cost Extract records to staging target table STG_STANDARD_COST table
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_STD_COST_TTS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Source qualifier to read the source records from HQ400A table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_CTBLP010

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT CTBLP010.CSPRODGRP, CTBLP010.CSCOMPID, CTBLP010.CSTPLANT, CTBLP010.CSTSTYLE, CTBLP010.CSTSIZE, CTBLP010.CSTCOLOR, CTBLP010.CSSTDCOST FROM CTLIB.CTBLP010 CTBLP010

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used to set the default values for the control table. As this mapping is reusable for other LOBs , the source table name, info_map_name, map_desc arer passed as parameters. The values will be provided in the param file mentioned in the workflow.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CNTL_TBL

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: 'Loads data from CTLIB.CTBLP010 to target table:STG_STANDARD_COST'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: MAP_DESCP

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to handle the hardcosing and other calculations
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_STG_STD_COST

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This aggregator transformation is used to get the source records count.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: AGG_SRC_CNT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target for the control table used to match the source and target counts.
INSTANCE.NAME: INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source qualifier to read the source records from HQ400A table.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_CTBLP010

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used to set the default values for the control table. As this mapping is reusable for other LOBs , the source table name, info_map_name, map_desc arer passed as parameters. The values will be provided in the param file mentioned in the workflow.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_CNTL_TBL

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to handle the hardcosing and other calculations
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_STG_STD_COST

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This aggregator transformation is used to get the source records count.
INSTANCE.NAME: AGG_SRC_CNT

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Session loads TTS Standard Cost Extract records to staging target table STG_STANDARD_COST table
SESSION.NAME: s_m_STG_STD_COST_TTS

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Post SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
UPDATE INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL SET TGT_VAL=( SELECT count(*) FROM STG_STANDARD_COST WHERE PRS_TSP= (SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_STG_STD_COST_TTS' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE)) WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_STG_STD_COST_TTS' AND MAP_RUN_DT=(SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_STG_STD_COST_TTS' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE ) ;
UPDATE INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL SET STATUS_YN = (CASE WHEN SRC_VAL = TGT_VAL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_STG_STD_COST_TTS' AND MAP_RUN_DT=(SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_STG_STD_COST_TTS' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE );

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_STG_STD_COST_TTS

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
